text: "Hold on Tight" is a 1981 song by British band Electric Light Orchestra and taken from their ninth studio album Time. It went to number one in Spain and Switzerland, number 2 in Austria and Germany, number 5 in Australia and the Netherlands, number 7 in New Zealand, number 4 in the United Kingdom and number 10 in the United States. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Electric Light Orchestra songs
title: Hold On Tight (Electric Light Orchestra song)
